meanings.definition: The range of frequencies that can pass through a filter or communication channel.
meanings.sent1: The passband of the radio filter allows only certain frequencies to pass through.
meanings.sent2: The passband of the internet connection determines the speed of data transfer.
meanings.sent3: The passband of the music player made sure only the best quality sounds reached my ears.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a passband, filtering out the noise and leaving only the sweet melody.
meanings.sent5: I adjusted the passband to hear the faint whispers clearly.

meanings.definition: The band of frequencies that are allowed to pass through a filter or communication channel.
meanings.sent1: The passband of the signal filter was carefully set to avoid interference.
meanings.sent2: The passband of the phone network determines the call quality.
meanings.sent3: The passband of the TV antenna seemed to have a mind of its own, tuning in and out randomly.
meanings.sent4: His mind acted like a passband, letting only the important information through.
meanings.sent5: The passband of the security system detected the slightest movement.
